Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Was leaving a friends property & while closing his gate, looked up & spotted the first object moving eradically. I later spotted a second object.
divs: Sighting Details I was leaving a friend's property, & while closing his gate, I looked up & spotted the first object moving eradically(up & down-back & forth), in front of a hillside known as Gold Hill. I pretty much knew it was a UFO from the time I first noticed it. The object appeared to be yellowish-orange in color & sometimes turning to a reddish color. My son had just called me to come pick him up from trick or treating(it was Holloween night). I went to town & picked him up & drove back out to the road my friend lives on, & the object was still in the same area. I wanted my son to see it too. We then left that area & went home(approximately 5 miles away). After arriving at our house, I told my mother about it & she came outside & saw it too. It was pretty cold outside, in the 30's, so she went back inside. I also went inside to get my camera. I was excited to see it since it had been about a year from the time I had my last siting, & couldn't wait to see if I could get some good photos of it. I went back out to start taking pictures. Approximately an hour had passed from the time I first noticed the first object, when I noticed the second object rising up from behind Gold Hill, right where a beacon light is located. That's the one I took most of my pictures of. That one was only by the hill for a few minutes, & then it made it's way over towards the first object where it stayed for the rest of the time I was outside. I finally went back inside at about 2:30 AM because my fingers were almost numb from the cold. The objects were still there when I went inside. I managed to get 9 pictures, 7 of which are fairly good. When I say they're fairly good, I mean that they're good enough to see a shape. I took the pictures from my bedroom balcony. I've been watching the sky more often since that night hoping to see another one so maybe I could get some better photos. I would like to be contacted by someone that could analize my photos & possibly blow them up with me present so I could get a better view of them. I'm afraid that if I try to do it, I might delete them & lose them. My camera is a new one, & new to me, so I'm not real familiar with it yet. It is a pretty good digital camera.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sagle
This sighting has never been favorited.
